Articles.Content:
This is the boat you saw being carried around By the KTP-90 Seahopper.

At first the idea was to create a boat that would work and could be carried on a cargoplane, but then i had an idea, why not turn it in to a seaplane that could turn into a boat.

So this happened

Separation at around 50 m/s

Landed. And full speed ahead straight away.

The boat itself is very fast and manouverable and robust aswell, so it can pretty much take on anything.

And it also flyes very nicely and quickly while in plane mode.

So i hope you enjoyed it .

Download link: https://www.dropbox.com/s/eucu8lvtd4rl9qq/x-50%20%28plane%29.craft?dl=0
